CHAT.comment: mom covers child's eyes.
INV rolls toy car into room.
mom uncovers child's eyes
mom goes to take child's coat off, but he refuses.
mom rolls car back and forth to show child.
child sits in mom's lap.
child goes to play with car, then goes back to mom.
child tries to see if trunk opens.
child drives car towards mom.
mom rolls car into child's foot.
child pretends to put something in the trunk and makes unintelligible noise.
mom takes child's coat off.
mom places hand over car to act as bridge.
mom has child stand up with legs spread and drives car through them.
mom laugh and child sighs and sits back down.
mom straightens child's legs out and drives car up his body.
child drives car under his legs.
mom sends car back under child's legs.
child tries to send car under his legs and falls off mom's lap.
mom drives car on child's back and he screams unintelligible noise.
mom grabs a chair and turns it over to form a bridge.
child walks near fish tank and perks his head up.
child and mom pick chair back up and child accidentally hits mom in the face.
child sits back down in mom's lap.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
mom moves chair around.
mom is referring to steering wheel.
child opens hood of car.
child pretends to give something to mom.
child drives car over to couch and pretends to fill it up with gas while making unintelligible noises.
INV takes car from room
mom laughs and gives child a kiss.
INV enters room with Robodog
INV leaves room.
child goes over to robodog and pushes button on back, but once it moves it's head, child jumps back.
child pushes button again and robodog starts to walk away.
mom pets robodog's head.
while mom is petting robodog, it starts to move its head.
mom presses button on robodog's back and child touches head and robodog begins to sit down.
mom and child both jump back.
mom points to robodog wagging his tail.
mom touches robodog's nose and head.
mom covers robodog's eyes.
mom takes hand away.
child turns his head sideways to look at robodog.
mom motions to robodog's legs.
robodog starts to walk away.
child picks up robodog and faces it towards mom.
mom straightens out her legs to see what happens.
robodog starts walking towards mom's legs again.
child goes to press button on robodog's back.
mom tries to press it and then picks robodog up for a closer look and talks to it.
mom puts robodog back down.
mom presses button on robodog's head and it stops.
mom and child talk to robodog.
mom and child pet robodog's head.
robodog starts to walk backwards.
mom and child talk to robodog.
robodog stops for a second but then keeps walking.
child gets up and walks to other side of mom.
mom picks robodog up to show child who pets it.
mom puts robodog back on floor.
robodog starts walking backwards.
mom and child talk to robodog.
robodog starts moving backwards.
mom and child talk to robodog.
mom whistles to dog.
mom whistles again and snaps her fingers.
child puts his face up to robodog's head.
INV leaves room with robodog.
mom gives child some kisses, utters unintelligible phrase, and covers child's eyes up.
INV enters room with degu.
mom uncovers child's eyes.
INV leaves room.
mom and child go over to degu's cage.
child tries to open top of cage.
mom moves to other side of cage.
mom sticks finger in cage to get degu's attention and talks to it.
child sticks fingers in top of cage and makes noises at degu.
mom runs fingers over cage to make a sound and degu moves around.
mom and child talk to degu.
child runs hand over top of cage to make noise and degu runs to opposite side of cage.
mom and child talk to degu.
child runs hand over top of cage, makes noise, and scares degu.
child starts playing with top of cage where water bottle goes.
mom and child talk to degu.
child points to bottom of cage.
child sighs.
mom and child talk to degu.
child runs hand over top of cage quickly and makes noise.
child continues to make noise and mom moves to other side of table.
mom and child talk to degu.
degu comes over to mom and child.
mom and child talk to degu.
mom and child tap on cage while degu walks around.
mom and child talk to degu.
child moves to another side of table and sits on chair.
mom moves cage closer to child.
INV takes degu from room.
mom laughs.
mom and INV speak simultaneously.
mom covers child's eyes.
INV uncovers computer box and child opens eyes.
INV leaves room.
mom and child move over to computer box.
child looks behind computer box.
computer box makes noise and lights up as child tinkers with it.
computer box makes noise.
mom begins to join child and tinkers with computer box.
mom points to light at top of computer box.
mom points to a different light, but as child goes to answer, computer box makes noise.
mom points to top sensor on computer box.
child touches sensor, mom covers his hand, and computer box makes different noises.
mom gasps numerous times as child makes computer box do different things.
mom laughs as child repeatedly plays with computer box.
child looks around the room.
mom takes child's hand away and covers the top sensor of computer box with her own hand and then takes it off.
computer box makes noise, so child tries to cover top sensor.
child removes hand from computer box.
child puts hand on again and computer box lights up.
child places his hands back on computer box and it makes noise.
child puts hands on middle sensor and computer box lights up and makes noise.
mom points to row of lights on side of computer box.
mom and child both cover sensor on computer box and mom laughs.
child walks over to table.
child brings chair over to computer box and sits down.
child plays with computer box and it makes noises and lights up.
child looks at mom and mom gasps.
child closes his eyes.
mom begins to tinker with computer box.
mom holds her hand out and child slaps it a few times.
child bangs on computer box.
child continues to play with computer box and it lights up and makes noises.
computer box stops making noise for a second, but then starts up again after child touches it.
mom gives child a hug and a kiss.
mom laughs.
child moves chair back to table.
INV covers computer box.
INV goes over to fish tank.
child goes over to tank and he and INV uncover it
mom gasps.
INV leaves room.
mom joins child in front of tank.
child points to back of tank.
child walks away from tank and mom moves to other side to see starfish.
child squeezes between mom and chair to get to couch.
mom moves over to couch.
mom sits in chair in front of tank and child stands next to her.
mom taps on side of tank where starfish is.
mom goes to put child on her lap.
mom knocks on glass.
mom puts child on her lap.
mom puts child down on other side of tank.
mom touches child's hair and mom and child laugh.
child squeezes between mom and chair to get to couch.
mom motions to microphone hanging over her head.
child pretends his hand is a lawn mower and moves it over glass while making noise.
mom points to top of cage.
child goes over and sits on chair.
child stands up to get a better view.
child goes over to couch.
INV enters room.
INV covers up fish tank.
INV leaves room and comes back with meerkat.
INV gives meerkat to child.
INV leaves room.
mom tickles child with meerkat.
mom starts to tickle child again and he laughs.
mom lifts up child's shirt and puts meerkat on his bare back.
child laughs.
mom has meerkat give child a kiss on the nose.
mom wags meerkat's tail and child sticks his foot out to touch it.
child puts his foot on meerkat and laughs, then mom bops child on head with meerkat.
mom gives meerkat to child.
child lays on couch and throws meerkat to mom and then they play catch.
child laughs.
mom holds meerkat up and then has him move towards child.
mom motions to meerkat's ears.
child chews on meerkat's ear.
child throws meerkat across room and mom gasps.
child climbs off of table to get meerkat.
child brings meerkat back to couch and laughs.
mom has meerkat gives child kisses and makes kissing noises.
child holds meerkat up to mom's face, so she talks to it.
mom pretends meerkat kisses her and then child.
child laughs and makes unintelligible noises.
mom gasps.
child sits up and gives meerkat a big kiss.
mom kisses meerkat.
child moves over to table and sits on a chair.
mom walks meerkat across floor towards child, who starts talking to it.
mom walks meerkat on couch and pretends to sniff around.
mom jumps meerkat into child's lap who laughs.
child takes meerkat from mom and laughs.
child makes unintelligible noise and jumps meerkat onto mom's lap.
mom walks meerkat onto couch.
mom jumps meerkat onto child's lap and he laughs.
child takes meerkat and does the same.
child laughs and makes unintelligible noises.
child goes over and pets meerkat while making unintelligible noises.
mom touches child's neck with meerkat and makes a meowing noise.
INV enters room.
